scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec -w /app/apps/api api yarn prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec -w /app/apps/api api sh -lc "yarn prisma:reset && yarn prisma:seed"
scripts.db:init: yarn docker:up:infra && docker compose up -d api && yarn db:migrate && yarn db:seed
scripts.dev:all: yarn db:init && yarn docker:up:apps && docker compose logs -f api web
